quote: Don't be afraid to go out on a limb. That's where the fruit is.
Many of life's failures are people who did not realize how close they were to success when they gave up.
An obstacle may be either a stepping stone or a stumbling block.
Nothing worthwhile comes easily. Work, continuous work and hard work, is the only way to accomplish results that last.
If opportunity doesn't knock, then build a door.
I know for sure that what we dwell on is who we become.
To make our way, we must have firm resolve, persistence, tenacity. We must gear ourselves to work hard all the way. We can never let up.
Success consists of going from failure to failure without loss of enthusiasm.
Achievement is largely the product of steadily raising one's levels of aspirations and expectation.
The only thing worse than starting something and failing... is not starting something.
There are no traffic jams along the extra mile.
Whether you think you can, or think you can't, you're right.
Either I will find a way, or I will make one.
The longer we dwell on our misfortunes, the greater their power to harm us.
If you do what you've always done, you'll get what you've always gotten.
It is never too late to be what you might have been.
Success seems to be largely a matter of hanging on after others have let go.
When one door closes, another opens; but we often look so long and so regretfully upon the closed door that we do not see the one which has opened for us.
Success is never final. Failure is never fatal. It is courage that counts.
When you reach the end of your rope, tie a knot in it and hang on.
Obstacles can't stop you. Problems can't stop you. Most of all, other people can't stop you. Only you can stop you.
Attitude is a little thing that makes a big difference.
Do not let what you cannot do interfere with what you can do.
Even if you're on the right track, you'll get run over if you just sit there.
Tough times don't last... tough people do.
Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone else's life.
Either you run the day, or the day runs you.
Believe you can and you're halfway there.
Too many of us are not living our dreams because we are living our fears.
The question isn't who is going to let me; it's who is going to stop me.
Nothing is impossible. The word itself says, (I'm possible!)
You miss 100% of the shots you don't take.
I can accept failure, everyone fails at something. But I can't accept not trying.
Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can.
You become what you believe.
The best thing you can do is the right thing; the next best thing you can do is the wrong thing; the worst thing you can do is nothing.
It doesn't matter where you are, you are nowhere compared to where you can go.
Take risks: if you win, you will be happy; if you lose, you will be wise.
People who are unable to motivate themselves must be content with mediocrity, no matter how impressive their other talents.
Success doesn't come to you, you go to it.
